name: Medusa
skill: Deals 2387/2847 DMG to 3 enemies (melee priority), with a chance of inflicting Petrifaction.
ability: Low chance to inflict Petrifaction on all melee foes at the start of each wave.

additional_data.description: A spirit with the ability to turn people to stone through eye contact. She used to be extremely arrogant, much to the annoyance of a certain goddess who turned her into a horrifying monster as punishment. As a spirit, she reformed her behavior and the goddess turned her back into her human form... but apparently this was all just part of her master plan. Now, as a beautiful young woman who also has the power to petrify, she's watching and waiting for a chance for revenge.

main: "Let's all go out for lunch sometime!"
skill: "Allow me to turn you all to stone."
limit_break: "I wonder if my petrification powers have gotten stronger, too?"
